LanguageData.JRWHalszkaraptor.label: Halszkaraptor
LanguageData.JRWHalszkaraptor.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #084732-2017 [HALSZKARAPTOR ESCUILLIEI] CODENAME: BLACK-SWAN >3
A bizarre dromaeosaur that adapted to a semi-aquatic lifestyle, similar to geese and other such waterfowl. Though graceful, their attacks are swift and deadly.
LanguageData.JRWHalszkaraptor.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.JRWHalszkaraptor.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.JRWHalszkaraptor.tools.teeth.label: teeth
LanguageData.JRWHalszkaraptor.tools.head.label: head
